SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.hisPopup.mapper.IsoSpItmPurSalHisPopupMapper.selectHisIsoSpItmPurSal2024 */ YR ,BRNO ,UO_BRNO ,ITEM_CD ,( (SELECT ITEM_NM FROM TB_ITEM_CRTR WHERE ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD) || '(' || (SELECT (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE' AND CD_VL = YGC.STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE) FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD YGC WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD) || ')' ) AS ITEM_NM ,(SELECT STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD ) AS STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE ,(SELECT CTGRY_CD FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD )AS CTGRY_CD ,PRDCR_OGNZ_SN ,TYPE_SE_NO ,DECODE(PST.TYPE_SE_NO, '5', '(생산자조직)전속출하', '6', '(생산자조직)전속출하', '7', '생산자조직 외', '8', '합계', '') AS SE_NM ,DECODE(PST.TYPE_SE_NO , '5', (SELECT (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'TRMT_TYPE' AND CD_VL = FA.TRMT_TYPE) FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_APO FA WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.BRNO AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = PST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN) , '6', '소계', '7', '', '8', '합계', '') AS TRMT_TYPE_NM ,DECODE(PST.TYPE_SE_NO , '5', (SELECT PRDCR_OGNZ_NM FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_APO FA WHERE 1=1 AND YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.BRNO AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = PST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN) , '6', '소계', '7', '농가, 법인 등', '8', '합계', '') AS PRCHS_NM , PST.SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_AMT , PST.UO_SPMT_AMT , PST.UO_OTHER_SPMT_AMT , (NVL(PST.UO_SPMT_AMT,0) + NVL(UO_OTHER_SPMT_AMT,0)) AS SPMT_AMT_TOT
FROM TB_EV_UO_ISO_PRCHS_PRCHS_SLS_TOT PST WHERE 1=1 AND YR = #{yr} AND APO_SE = '2' AND BRNO = #{brno} AND UO_BRNO = #{uoBrno} AND ( (TYPE_SE_NO != '5' AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = '0') OR ( TYPE_SE_NO = '5' AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = (SELECT PRDCR_OGNZ_SN FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_APO WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.BRNO AND UO_BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = PST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN AND STBLT_YN = 'Y' AND NVL(EXCL_YN,'N') != 'Y') ) ) AND ITEM_CD = (SELECT ITEM_CD FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD WHERE 1=1 AND YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD AND STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE IN ('1','2')) ORDER BY ITEM_CD , TYPE_SE_NO

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.hisPopup.mapper.IsoSpItmPurSalHisPopupMapper.selectHisIsoSpItmPurSal2025 */ YR ,BRNO ,UO_BRNO ,ITEM_CD ,( (SELECT ITEM_NM FROM TB_ITEM_CRTR WHERE ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD) || '(' || (SELECT (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE' AND CD_VL = YGC.STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE) FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD YGC WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD) || ')' ) AS ITEM_NM ,(SELECT STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD) AS STTG_UPBR_ITEM_SE ,(SELECT CTGRY_CD FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD)AS CTGRY_CD ,PRDCR_OGNZ_SN ,TYPE_SE_NO ,DECODE(PST.TYPE_SE_NO, '5', DECODE(PST.OGNZ_STBLT_YN, 'Y', '(생산자조직)전속출하', 'N' , '(요건미달)전속출하', '') , '6', DECODE(PST.OGNZ_STBLT_YN, 'Y', '(생산자조직)전속출하', 'N' , '(요건미달)전속출하', ''), '7', '생산자조직 외', '8', '합계', '') AS SE_NM ,DECODE(PST.TYPE_SE_NO , '5', (SELECT (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'TRMT_TYPE' AND CD_VL = FA.TRMT_TYPE) FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_APO FA WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.BRNO AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = PST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN) , '6', '소계', '7', '', '8', '합계', '') AS TRMT_TYPE_NM ,DECODE(PST.TYPE_SE_NO , '5', (SELECT PRDCR_OGNZ_NM FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_APO FA WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.BRNO AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = PST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN) , '6', '소계', '7', '농가, 법인 등', '8', '합계', '') AS PRCHS_NM
, PST.SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_VLM , PST.SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_AMT , PST.UO_SPMT_VLM , PST.UO_SPMT_AMT , PST.UO_OTHER_SPMT_VLM , PST.UO_OTHER_SPMT_AMT
, (NVL(PST.UO_SPMT_VLM,0) + NVL(UO_OTHER_SPMT_VLM,0)) AS SPMT_VLM_TOT , (NVL(PST.UO_SPMT_AMT,0) + NVL(UO_OTHER_SPMT_AMT,0)) AS SPMT_AMT_TOT
FROM TB_EV_UO_ISO_PRCHS_PRCHS_SLS_TOT PST WHERE 1=1 AND YR = #{yr} AND APO_SE = '2' AND BRNO = #{brno} AND UO_BRNO = #{uoBrno} AND ( (TYPE_SE_NO != '5' AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = '0') OR (TYPE_SE_NO = '5' AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = (SELECT PRDCR_OGNZ_SN FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_APO WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.BRNO AND UO_BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = PST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN AND NVL(EXCL_YN,'N') != 'Y')) ) AND ITEM_CD = (SELECT ITEM_CD FROM TB_EV_APO_YR_GPC_CD WHERE YR = PST.YR AND BRNO = PST.UO_BRNO AND ITEM_CD = PST.ITEM_CD) ORDER BY ITEM_CD , OGNZ_STBLT_YN DESC , CASE WHEN TRMT_TYPE = 1 THEN 3 WHEN TRMT_TYPE = 2 THEN 1 WHEN TRMT_TYPE = 3 THEN 2 ELSE 4 END , TYPE_SE_NO
